name: Andreas Georgiou
tagline: Computer Science student at University of Bristol
body:
### Hello!
My name is Andreas Georgiou. I am currently a third year computer science student at University of Bristol. I love technology, computers and maths. I am particularly interested in cryptography, computational neuroscience and artificial intelligence. Up for a chat? Contact me via any of the means below.

### Contact me
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
